attributes.action: prohibit Scottish and Welsh MP's from being allowed to vote on laws affecting only the  English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That MP's from Scotland and Wales should not be permitted any say, whatsover, that affects English residents. Their respective countries have their own Parliaments and as such should be only able to have legislative powers in these coutries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
